Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Minnesota in 1986...
Released by Minnesota on 9/1/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 9/1/1986 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/18/1988 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1992, off Masumi Kuwata (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1992, off Jose Melendez (PIT)...
Injured on 7/9/1992 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1992, hitting .273 with 26 HR, 90 RBI...
Injured on 7/29/1994 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Hit 3 homeruns against Los Angeles, driving in 4 runs on 9/21/1994...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1995, hitting .333 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1995, hitting .359 with 12 HR, 30 RBI...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1997, hitting .667 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 1998 Allstar game...
Won MVP Award in 1998, hitting .298 with 33 HR, 110 RBI...
